title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 592.1 - Purpose and applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 592.1 - Purpose and applicability

State Regulations
(a) The purpose of this Part is to set forth
in regulation a procedure to be followed by the department when modifying or
extinguishing a DEC conservation easement, as that term is defined in section
592.2
(c) below. (b) This Part will not apply
to conservation easements which are owned or held by not-for-profit
organizations or public bodies other than the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
592.1

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
